videos.description: Check out Quillbot at - https://shorturl.at/9GqOH 0:00 Intro 1:27 Finding the Gap 5:47 Sponser - Quillbot 6:45 Stage‚Äôs Positioning 11:24 Scale & Future Growth 13:01 Final Thoughts India has 60+ crore OTT users, but only a small fraction pay for content ‚Äî and one big reason is language. videos.description: On todays episode we have none other than Raamdeo Agarwal , the Chairman of Motilal Oswal ltd. Raamdeo has over 25 years of experience in the capital markets, he's watched several bull and bear markets. Raamdeos journey is nothing short of remarkable.
